TopicTitle: CAN someone do this for my game

Articles.Content:
i need someone to say "A Houston we have a problem" for my game and send it to [email removed]. My voice is to high..... i have tried Altering my voice but nope.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T00:35:48Z" title="05/26/2015 12:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**

Friendly reminder: don't leave your e-mail lying around like that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'd be glad to help, but don't know if I can send you the file with my tablet.
